Bibliographic References: PAdd, no. A 337; PPNon Sepcifieds, pi. 38 c
Imagery Description: Eros seated on folded drapery, holding fan. In style this vase has something in common with the contemporary minor r.f. vases from Sicily, which probably reflect a similar influence (cf. the bottle Gela 6193 = LCS, p. 619, no. 232; Kokalos 4, 1958, pi. 24, fig. 52, representing Eros holding a fan).
